title: Chiefs still winning, Lions break through,  2 pt conversion questions, Nate Burleson drops by, and a MNF Preview!
itunes:title: Chiefs still winning, Lions break through,  2 pt conversion questions, Nate Burleson drops by, and a MNF Preview!
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Super Bowl Champion Kurt Warner look at how the Chiefs still aren't playing their best football but are getting wins. The Lions got their first win of the season and it was worth more than just a game on the field for Dan Campbell and the Michigan community. The Steelers get past the Ravens on a failed two point conversion attempt from Baltimore that will be debated all season long. The crew debates who will be the most intriguing QB down the stretch before Nate Burleson drops by. We wrap up looking ahead to tonight's Patriots-Bills matchup on Monday Night Football.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
